banner.intro: I'm a 24 year old programmer and web designer. My specialties include Angular, Typescript, and Javascript, but I have a passion for logical languages. I have been studying and working as a Frontend Developer for more than a year now. I am currently looking for a position as such or even better, as a Backend Developer. I am curious to learn new languages ​​and stay open to any learning opportunities.

skills.title: Skills
skills.intro: Here are some of the tools and skills acquired in my studies and/or in my work experiences.

projects.proj-intro: A selection of my range of work.
projects.CV-intro: Here is my resume that collects my skills, abilities and knowledge.
projects.xp-intro: Explore some of the key professional experiences that have shaped my journey.
projects.oneC-desc: During my experience with One Community, I contributed to building their management site using the MERN stack, enhancing both performance and design. With a focus on testing, this volunteer role allowed me to work with real code, managing permissions, tracking time, and gaining valuable insights into the role of a Fullstack Developer.
projects.inspi-desc: Inspiring gave me the opportunity to collaborate with a highly professional team on industry management software. My main project focused on the Internet of Things, handling large datasets and user interactions. I also contributed to key common components like the sidenav and toolbar, making them adaptable by developing dynamic components.
